title: India teachers’ fight for period leave gathers steam

title: Abba Kyari: The Nigerian super sleuth wanted in the US

title: Climate change: Low-income countries 'can't keep up' with impacts

description: There's been a spate of content with incorrect claims around some of the competitors in Tokyo.

title: 'Walking to space was the best day of my life'

title: In pictures: Egypt pharaoh's 'solar boat' moved to Giza museum
description: The Great Boat of King Khufu is more than 4,500 years old, and was found virtually intact in 1954.

title: Men's Olympic football: Brazil defend title with win over Spain
description: Brazil defend their Olympic men's football title following a dramatic extra-time victory over Spain.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Laura Muir comes to terms with place in history after 1500m silver
description: Great Britain's Laura Muir did not get much sleep after her 1500m silver, but is now starting to come to terms with her success.

title: Afghanistan war: Taliban say jail captured and prisoners freed
description: Video on social media shows hundreds of inmates leaving the Afghan jail after heavy militant attacks.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Joe Choong wins gold for Great Britain in men's modern pentathlon
description: Joe Choong wins gold in the men's modern pentathlon to seal an Olympic double for Great Britain after Kate French triumphed in the women's event.

title: Bat killed by cat after record 1,200-mile journey
description: A record-breaking bat - the size of a human thumb - is discovered in Russia after flying from London.

description: Paris St-Germain are in talks with Lionel Messi's representatives about the Argentina forward joining the Ligue 1 club following his Barcelona exit.

description: Joe Choong becomes Great Britain's first individual medallist in modern pentathlon, winning gold at the Tokyo Olympics.

title: Dungannon: Man arrested on suspicion of murder after child's death
description: A 32-year-old man is in custody on suspicion of murder after the young girl died in hospital.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Cyclists Matt Walls and Ethan Hayter win silver in men's madison

title: Covid: Wales moves to alert level zero with most rules scrapped
description: Social distancing ends, but face masks are still needed in shops and on public transport.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Gold for Galal Yafai, Tom Daley takes bronze & madison silver for Walls and Hayter
description: Tom Daley claims bronze in the men's 10m platform after boxer Galal Yafai wins Team GB's first boxing gold in Tokyo to become Olympic flyweight champion.

title: Tokyo Olympics: Brazil's Hebert Sousa wins men's middleweight gold by knockout against Oleksandr Khyzhniak
description: Brazil's Hebert Sousa wins gold in the men's middleweight boxing by knocking out Ukraine's Oleksandr Khyzhniak with a brilliant punch.

title: Archbishop of York: English people feel left behind by metropolitan elites
description: Many English people are "patronised as backwardly xenophobic", the Archbishop of York says.

description: GB's Tom Daley wins bronze in men's 10m platform at Tokyo 2020 as China's Cao Yuan makes history.

title: Capturing the disappearing sounds of the workplace
